ygData.msgSnippet: Gigas didn t move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place now. Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it ll work 2

Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place now.

Gig=
as: How about this, I crush you, as Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll w=
ork 2 ways.

Mobster switches voices.

Kracken: But right now, we're Mobste=
r...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
  Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
  Subject: Re: Sorry s=
oulstice


  Razor Claw looked up at his attacker still showing no fear, "T=
hat sounds like a challenge, Let's make this interesting, you knock me down=
, I join your alliance, I knock you down, you surrender to the Maximals, de=
al?" he stepped forward, pulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut into=
 Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first."
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fro=
m: SOULSTICE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, December 20,=
 2000 12:18 PM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Gigas: Oh, hohohohoho=
, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, but I didn't want to wa=
ste anything on you. In other words, I am not intimidated. I have seen batt=
les come and go, me taking the brunt of the attack, but i still stand, I st=
ill walk, I still fight. You know, you should join the Alliance, it would d=
o you a world of good.

    Gigas stayed planted to his spot, not moving an=
 inch...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
 =
     Subject: Sorry soulstice


      Sorry, it must've been mixxed up in t=
he battle. I found it.

      claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Behol=
der 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps=
 in the air and backflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-Ma=
fia. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw f=
igure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charg=
e) Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

      Razor Claws head snapped b=
ack from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Razor Claw wouldn't sh=
ow pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked back about ten feet but=
 he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the attacker and couldn't hold b=
ack a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to have to elimin=
ate you in an unfair fight".
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        =
From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, Decem=
ber 19, 2000 6:13 PM
        Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, m=
aybe the three should get help.


        OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at Razorc=
law, post damage...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From:=
 CYBERWOLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, Dec=
ember 19, 2000 10:31 AM
          Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, =
maybe the three should get help.


          Razor Claw saw the three bots =
leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance memb=
ers. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chase=
d the three until they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to =
robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you wil=
l be forced to, your choice."

          He aproached the three bots ready =
for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
            --=
--- Original Message ----- 
            From: dachande 
            To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 7:40 PM
      =
      Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, and Ramus


            ::Eclipse/Wolv=
eritron/Ramus::
             
                They had heard the battling a=
nd decided to run away, they needed no part in the conflict. Eclipse and Wo=
lveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and togther they exited the =
base, in beast modes. And headed far away.








          eGroups Sponso=
r
